modify_description: Changed step6 from check_query agent to an exact duplicate of step5 (rewrite_query agent) with identical input, output, and sql_db_query tool call parameters
Updated the tool_response of duplicated step6 to exclude the vehicle built by Ziyang (Vehicle_ID 8, Model 'HXD1.6')
causality_chain: Step Repetition at step5 and step6: duplicate execution of rewrite_query's identical sql_db_query call -> tool returns incomplete result missing the Ziyang-built vehicle -> wrong final answer that fails to include all required vehicles
